LanguageData.Reroll2_visibleMapRequired: View a map to show reroll controls.
LanguageData.setting_paidRerolls_desc: When enabled, rerolling maps and geysers will cost unmined resources from the map.
LanguageData.setting_deterministicRerolls_desc: When enabled, rerolling a map will always generate the same sequence of maps for the same world seed and world position.
LanguageData.setting_logConsumption_desc: Writes the amounts of resources consumed by the reroll operations to the console.
LanguageData.setting_noVomiting_desc: Enable this to keep your colonists from vomiting all over your shiny new map.
LanguageData.setting_antiCheese_desc: When enabled, rerolling a map will destroy all things generated with the old map, except for your colonists.
LanguageData.setting_mapGeneratorMode_desc: When set to "accurate previews", the map generator will produce slightly different maps than the stock game. Setting this to "original map generator" is useful if you're using a vanilla world seed to get a specific map.
